typeSystemDescription.name: Number of Syntactic Constituent type
typeSystemDescription.description: The number of syntactic contituent feature type. Extends: ComplexityFeatureBase. Dependency: Feature types: none Linguistic types: ParseTree

featureDescription.name: contituentType
featureDescription.description: the constituent type, should be one of the following: VP Verb Phrases C Clauses T T-units DC Dependent Clauses CT Complex T-unit CP Coordinate Phrases CN Complex nominal FC Fragment Clauses FT Frgment T-units
